description: DTED Level 1 .DT1 and Level 2 .DT2 files also contain terrain data at increasing resolution. Level 0 files have the lowest resolution data with grid points spaced at 30 arc seconds, or roughly one kilometer.

The DTED Level 0 data set was contributed by a coalition of countries, including Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, and the United Kingdom. The data set is freely available.
